item.title: Are Galaxy Agrico Exports Ltd latest results good or bad?
item.description: Galaxy Agrico Exports Ltd's latest results are concerning, showing a 39.78% year-on-year decline in net sales and deteriorating profitability metrics, indicating significant operational challenges and questions about the company's sustainability. Time: 1 hour ago

item.title: Galaxy Agrico Exports Q2 FY26: Mounting Losses Raise Serious Concerns
item.description: Galaxy Agrico Exports Ltd., a micro-cap industrial manufacturing company with a market capitalisation of ₹15.00 crores, continues to struggle with operational challenges as reflected in its Q2 FY26 results. The company posted a net profit of ₹0.04 crores for the quarter ended September 2018, representing a 50.00% sequential increase but a troubling 86.21% year-on-year decline. Trading at ₹55.89, the stock has declined 0.29% in the latest session, reflecting investor concerns about the company's deteriorating fundamentals and persistent profitability challenges. Time: 2 hours ago

item.title: Alpex Solar Ltd Forms Death Cross, Signalling Potential Bearish Trend
item.description: Alpex Solar Ltd, a small-cap player in the Other Electrical Equipment sector, has recently formed a Death Cross, a significant technical indicator where the 50-day moving average crosses below the 200-day moving average. This development signals a potential shift towards a bearish trend, reflecting deteriorating momentum and raising concerns about the stock’s long-term strength. Time: 2 hours ago

item.title: Quarterly Earnings Review: Mixed Results Across 4,045 Stocks in Sep-2025 Quarter
item.description: The September 2025 quarter earnings season has unfolded with a mixed yet cautiously optimistic tone as 4,045 companies declared results, revealing sectoral disparities and varied performance across market capitalisations. While mid-cap firms led with a 50.0% positive result ratio, large caps lagged at 39.0%, signalling nuanced investor sentiment amid evolving macroeconomic conditions. Time: 2 hours ago
